name: DFS Group, Ltd.
description: DFS Group, Ltd. is a leading travel retailer specializing in the sale of luxury goods and duty-free products. Founded in 1960, DFS has established itself as a premier shopping destination for travelers around the globe. The company operates over 420 stores in 12 countries, primarily in major airports and downtown locations, offering an extensive range of products including designer fashion, fragrances, cosmetics, watches, jewelry, and fine wines and spirits. DFS is committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences through personalized service and exclusive offerings. The company collaborates with prestigious brands to provide travelers with unique shopping experiences and limited edition products. DFS also emphasizes sustainability and social responsibility, engaging in various initiatives to reduce environmental impact and support local communities. With a strong presence in key markets such as Asia-Pacific, DFS continues to innovate and adapt to the evolving travel retail landscape, catering to the diverse needs of international travelers.

seo.meta_title: DFS Group, Ltd. | Luxury Travel Retailer
seo.meta_description: Explore DFS Group, Ltd., a leading luxury travel retailer offering a wide range of designer goods, fragrances, cosmetics, and more. Discover exclusive products and exceptional service.

faq.question: What does DFS Group specialize in?
faq.answer: DFS Group specializes in luxury travel retail, offering a wide range of duty-free products, including fashion, watches, cosmetics, and fine wines.

faq.question: Where is DFS Group headquartered?
faq.answer: DFS Group is headquartered in Singapore.

faq.question: What product categories does DFS offer?
faq.answer: DFS offers luxury fashion, watches and jewelry, fragrances and cosmetics, as well as wines and spirits.
